Macros

macro shortDotProduct[N, M: static[int]; T, U, R](initial: R; x: array[N, T];
    y: array[M, U]): untyped
Macro for the expression initial + x[0] * y[0] + x[1] * y[1] + ... up to the length of the shortest array given. Source   Edit
